name: MotorGun - Return of the Auto Duel (Canceled)
blurb: An exciting new vehicular combat game with RPG elements.  Think Interstate 76 meets World of Tanks and mix in some old Autoduel.

rewards.reward: THANK YOU\r\n============================= \r\nThank you for your pledge! Everyone at Pixelbionic loves you! Every backer for this level or more will receive a KICKSTARTER BACKER BADGE on the MotorGun forums. You are invited to visit our forums where you get a place to speculate about the game, offer suggestions, and interact with the development team.

FAST SCOUT\r\n============================= \r\nDRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun  PC and MAC OSX. This low price only available for those who are the first to help fund. You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual.
SCOUT \r\n============================= \r\nDRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun for PC and MAC OSX.  You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual.

FAST HEAVY SCOUT ============================= 
BETA ACCESS =============================
DRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun for PC and MAC OSX.  You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual, and a DRM free copy of the game soundtrack in MP3 format.
This tier also grants access to the game at Beta.

HEAVY SCOUT ============================= 
BETA ACCESS
=============================
DRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun for PC and MAC OSX.  You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual, and a DRM free copy of the game soundtrack in MP3 format. This tier also grants access to the game at Beta.

FAST ATTACKER 
=============================
BETA ACCESS
=============================
DRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun for PC and MAC OSX.  You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual, a DRM free copy of the game soundtrack in MP3 format and a PDF of the fantastic concept art book,  Plus you get the Attacker, which is a backer exclusive car for you to show off to your friends.  This tier also grants access to the game at Beta.

ATTACKER 
=============================
BETA ACCESS
=============================
DRM free digital downloadable copy of MotorGun for PC and MAC OSX.  You'll also receive the digital enhanced game manual, a DRM free copy of the game soundtrack in MP3 format and a PDF of the fantastic concept art book,  Plus you get the Attacker, which is a backer exclusive car for you to show off to your friends.  This tier also grants access to the game at Beta.

DIGITAL MARAUDER
============================= 
ALPHA ACCESS
=============================
This is the digital version of the $100 tier and includes digital versions of all the $100 tier items without the pesky shipping fees and wasteful cardboard!
=============================
Includes digital versions of the following:
2 copies of the game, the game soundtrack, the PDF of the art book and a PDF of the comic
and 2 bonus cars, the Attacker and the Marauder.
=============================
This tier gives you special access to the game at alpha so you can help us playtest and tune the game for final release.

MARAUDER
============================= 
ALPHA ACCESS
=============================
This is the ultimate collectors box version of MotorGun and includes the following:  A MotorGun CD in all its physical splendor, a physical soundtrack CD, the hardbound concept art book and a wonderful printed MotorGun comic book.  In addition, this tier includes digital versions of all of the above and 2 bonus cars, the Attacker and the Marauder. Also, you get one extra DRM free digital download of the game in addition to the boxed copy!

This tier gives you special access to the game at alpha so you can help us playtest and tune the game for final release.

THE HEAVY MARAUDER ============================= 
ALPHA ACCESS
=============================  
The MARAUDER version of the collectors box comes with everything in the collectors box plus a snazzy backer only T-shirt, a color print of an original MotorGun concept drawing signed by the artist and 2 additional digital copies of the game (3 copies total).  Oh yeah and the game box will be signed by the MotorGun dream team!

This tier gives you special access to the game at alpha so you can help us playtest and tune the game for final release.

THE DIGITAL TIGER\r\n============================= \r\nPRE ALPHA ACCESS ============================= This is the digital version of the $500 tier and includes digital versions of all the $500 tier items without the pesky shipping fees and wasteful cardboard! ============================= Includes digital versions of the following: 3 copies of the game, the game soundtrack, the PDF of the art book and a PDF of the comic and 3 bonus cars, the Attacker, the Marauder and the Tiger. You can design a logo to go in the game, and you get pre-alpha access, access to the designers forum and a credit in the game as a guest designer..

THE TIGER
=============================
PRE-ALPHA ACCESS ============================= 
This is a one time chance to have your logo in the game.  Everything in the $150 tier plus you can give us any logo and we'll include your logo in the default set of stickers that can be applied to any car in the custom shop.  In addition you get special access to the game at pre-alpha, which is a fancy way of saying that you can play the game with us as soon as the first battleground is built and the game is playable.  Includes everything from all previous tiers including a physical box and 2 additional digital copies of the game.
============================= 
At this tier you become a guest designer and you have access to a special private designer forum where you can chat with members of the game's design team.  Of course as a designer you will be credited in game as such!

TYPHOON
============================= 
PRE-ALPHA ACCESS
============================= 
Everything in the $500 tier plus a total of 5 digital copies, a beautiful canvas printed copy of the MotorGun cover art,   In addition you can name one of the car parts in the custom shop.  Pick one part when you play the alpha version of the game and let us know what you want to name it.  You can name it after you, your kid or even your dog.  All the usual disclaimers apply here that we'd rather you not name it something trademarked or offensive. To show off your Tiger, you also get an incredible unpainted 1/18th scale maquette of the Tiger. ============================= 
At this tier you become one of the game designers and you have access to a special private designer forum where you can chat with members of the game's design team. Of course as a designer you will be credited in game as such!

WARLORD
=============================
PRE-ALPHA ACCESS =============================
Everything in the $1000 tier plus you can name one of the cars in the game.  To make sure you have friends to play with you also get 10 digital copies of the game you can hand out and a custom render of the car you named printed on canvas and signed by Maxx himself.

Also, we'll build you a fully painted 1/18th scale maquette of the Tiger.

THE FACTION LEADER\r\n=============================\r\nPRE-ALPHA ACCESS ============================= Everything in the $5000 tier plus you can design one of the cars in the game.  Send a picture of your car, a sketch, or just get on the phone with our lead artist and describe your ideal car and we'll model it and include it in the first set of cars that the game ships with.  This includes a full set of textures for the car so you can paint the car any crazy paint scheme you want!  To make sure your friends get to see your awesome car you also get 20 digital copies of the game you can share and a custom render of your car printed on canvas signed by Maxx himself.  Also as a revered high tier backer of the game you get a very rare ticket to our launch party and we'd love to hear from you so we'll give you our personal phone numbers so you can call us anytime you want to chat about the game.
